channel.title: Help with altar
channel.description: im using a chaos altar and i got two options Refill prayer & Refill Special here's my method [code] case 61: p.getActionSender().showChatboxInterface(p, 229); p.getActionSender().setString(p, "Refill Prayer.", 229, 2); p.getActionSender().setString(p, "Refill special.", 229, 3); break;[/code] how do i make those actions work? EDIT: 508/525
